workflowInfo.workflowDescription: Normal START of a Db2 system

variable.name: CONSNAME
variable.label: CONSNAME
variable.description: The CONSNAME variable specifies the name of a z/OS operator's console which is used to START/STOP Db2 systems.

variable.name: DSNEXIT
variable.label: DSNEXIT
variable.description: The value of the EXIT LIBRARY field specifies the name of the library where your DSNZPxxx module, application defaults load module (dsnhdecp), and exit routines are to be placed.

variable.name: DSNLOAD
variable.label: DSNLOAD
variable.description: The DSNLOAD variable specifies the name of the main APF-authorized Db2 load module library.

variable.name: DSNZPARM
variable.label: DSNZPARM
variable.description: The DSNZPARM variable specifies the member name of the load module that is to be used for Db2 subsystem parameters.

variable.name: GRPATTNM
variable.label: GRPATTNM
variable.description:
The value of the GROUP ATTACH field specifies a generic group attachment name.
This name is to be used for batch programs, the call attachment facility (CAF),
the RRS attachment facility (RRSAF), IMS, CICS Transaction Server for z/OS, and utilities.

variable.name: IRLMSSID
variable.label: IRLMSSID
variable.description: The SUBSYSTEM NAME field specifies the z/OS subsystem name for IRLM.

variable.name: MVSSNAME
variable.label: MVSSNAME
variable.description: The SUBSYSTEM NAME field specifies the z/OS subsystem name for Db2.

variable.name: MVSSPREF
variable.label: MVSSPREF
variable.description:
The COMMAND PREFIX variable specifies the Db2 subsystem command prefix.
When the prefix appears at the beginning of a command that is entered at a z/OS operator's console,
z/OS passes the command to Db2 for processing.
The command prefix is used in the Db2 entry of member IEFSSNxx of SYS1.PARMLIB.

variable.name: PROTADMN
variable.label: PROTADMN
variable.description: The SYSADM subsystem parameter specifies the first of two authorization IDs that are to have installation SYSADM authority.

step.name: stepJMD
step.title: Dynamically define Db2 and IRLM to z/OS (DSNTIJMD)
step.description: Job DSNTIJMD issues SETSSI commands to dynamically define Db2 and IRLM to z/OS.
step.instructions:
Run job DSNTIJMD to dynamically define Db2 and IRLM to z/OS.
If it runs successfully, it produces a return code of 0.

step.name: stepJSA
step.title: Start the Db2 system (DSNTIJSA)
step.description: Job DSNTIJSA issue a normal start for the Db2 system.
step.instructions:
Run job DSNTIJSA to start the provisioned Db2 system.
If it runs successfully, it produces a return code of 0.
